t=int(raw_input())
while t>0:
    n,m=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    p=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    if n==1:
        print m
    else:
        ans=m
        for i in range (len(p)):
            if p[i]<=m:
                for j in range(i,n):
                    if p[j]>p[i]:
                        c=m/p[i]
                        a=m-c*p[i]
                        a=a+c*p[j]
                        if a>ans:
                            ans=a
        print ans
    t=t-1
